page.title: 20Shopping in the Askhams
page.content: In our area there is only one shop and that is in Askham Bryan.It mainly sells food and drinks;it also sells a few gifts.The shop is owned by Mr and Mrs Hargreavas.Most people go into York for their main shopping and most people go by car.Marks and Spencers is a popular shop and mainly sells food and clothes.Most of the people in our area go shopping once a week.The wife is the one who goes shopping most and then the husband.There is one mobile shop in our area and a man called Mr.Benson runs it.People mainly buy fruit and vegetables from him. Mr.Benson comes round our area twice a week.There are several milkmen in the villages.Most people store their food in a freezer.
